      "comments": "The report covers the period September 2020-August 2021 and it states of covering Topshop by the end of 2021. Therefore, the cited document does not include Topshop information and no other reporting has been found for the company. pg. 6 “March 2021 We announced our commitment to publishing the supply chains of our newly-acquired brands – Topshop, Topman, Miss Selfridge and HIIT – for the first time by the end of 2021.” Manali Rana[https://wikirate.org/Manali_Rana].....2022-07-28 06:57:44 UTC",
